Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Authorizes the administration of vaccines for hepatitis A, hepatitis B, human papillomavirus, measles, mumps, rubella, varicella and COVID-19 by a licensed pharmacist
Summary: Authorizes the administration of vaccines for hepatitis A, hepatitis B, human papillomavirus, measles, mumps, rubella, varicella and COVID-19 by a licensed pharmacist.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the administration of vaccines for hepatitis A, hepatitis B, human papillomavirus, measles, mumps, rubella, varicella and polio by a licensed pharmacist
